November 20 / Lecture 9

Generative Adverserial Networks

Summary

In this lecture, we delve into the core principles of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) within the context of Quantum Machine Learning (QML). Explore the synergy between classical GANs and quantum computing, understanding how they collaborate to generate and manipulate data distributions for various applications.
